message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe holds significant value for your business. I'm confident that this product can generate substantial returns.  While I can't disclose the exact details just yet, I'm willing to offer you this product for $900000. This price reflects the potential value I see in it for you.  Please let me know if you're interested in discussing this further. I'm confident that this will be a mutually beneficial agreement.
